soft.name: Effective Communication
soft.description: Ability to convey ideas clearly and concisely, both verbally and in writing.

soft.name: Teamwork
soft.description: Capacity to collaborate and work well in a team, contributing to a harmonious work environment.

soft.name: Critical Thinking
soft.description: Ability to analyze information, identify problems, and make informed decisions.

soft.name: Adaptability
soft.description: Flexibility to adjust to new situations, learn quickly, and handle changes.

soft.name: Problem Solving
soft.description: Skill in efficiently identifying and resolving problems, finding creative solutions.

soft.name: Time Management
soft.description: Ability to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and manage time effectively.

soft.name: Empathy
soft.description: Capacity to understand and empathize with others, demonstrating sensitivity and respect.

soft.name: Leadership
soft.description: Ability to inspire and motivate others, providing guidance and direction.

soft.name: Strategic Thinking
soft.description: Capacity to visualize the big picture, identify goals, and plan strategically.

soft.name: Continuous learning
soft.description: Willingness to acquire new skills, seek knowledge, and stay updated.

hard.name: Programming Languages
hard.description: Proficiency in at least one programming language, such as JavaScript, TypeScript, among others.

hard.name: Algorithms and Data Structures
hard.description: Understanding and efficient implementation of fundamental algorithms and data structures, such as lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, etc.

hard.name: Web Development
hard.description: Knowledge of HTML, CSS, as well as experience with popular frameworks and libraries like React.

hard.name: Database Management
hard.description: Skills in designing and managing databases, such as MySQL, MongoDB, or Oracle, and knowledge of query languages like SQL.

hard.name: Debugging and Testing
hard.description: Ability to identify and fix bugs in code, as well as perform unit testing and integration testing to ensure software quality.

hard.name: Version Control
hard.description: Familiarity with version control systems like Git, and knowledge of branching, merging, and conflict resolution.

hard.name: Mobile Development
hard.description: Experience in developing mobile applications, using cross-platform frameworks like React Native.
